Module ShingShang
Package abstraction

Class Game

java.lang.Object
abstraction.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a Shing Shang game.
Author:
Tanguy Mossion

    Modifier and Type Field Description

    The board of the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean alertHasEatenBushi()
    Alerts the player that he ate an opponent's bushi, also ask if he wants to continue to play the round or not.
    boolean alertShingShang()
    Alerts the player that he is in Shing Shang, also ask if he wants to continue to jump or not.
    void changeCurrentPlayer​(Player newCurrentPlayer)
    Changes the current player to the newCurrentPlayer (his opponent)
    void displayCellsWhereBushiSelectedCanMove​(java.util.List<Cell> cellsWhereBushiSelectedCanMove)
    Displays the cells where bushi selected can move.
    void displayCurrentPlayer()
    Displays the current player.
    void displayWinner()
    Displays the winner.
    int[] getCoordinatesOfBushiToSelect()
    Returns the coordinates of the bushi to select.
    int[] getCoordinatesWhereToMoveBushiSelected()
    Returns the coordinates where to move bushi selected.
    void play()
    Starts the game and plays rounds until there is a winner
    Player playRound()
    Plays a round of the game

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(boolean isConsoleDisplay, Player aPlayer1, Player aPlayer2)
      Constructor initializing the Game with the board and the players
      Parameters:
      isConsoleDisplay - boolean indicating if you interacts by the console
      aPlayer1 - the player 1 of the game
      aPlayer2 - the player 2 of the game

  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play()
      Starts the game and plays rounds until there is a winner

    • playRound

      public Player playRound()
      Plays a round of the game
      Returns:
      the winner with a Player object
      See Also:
      Player

    • changeCurrentPlayer

      public void changeCurrentPlayer​(Player newCurrentPlayer)
      Changes the current player to the newCurrentPlayer (his opponent)
      Parameters:
      newCurrentPlayer - the next player

    • displayCurrentPlayer

      public void displayCurrentPlayer()
      Displays the current player. The way to display it depend on the boolean isConsoleDisplay

    • displayWinner

      public void displayWinner()
      Displays the winner. The way to display it depend on the boolean isConsoleDisplay

    • displayCellsWhereBushiSelectedCanMove

      public void displayCellsWhereBushiSelectedCanMove​(java.util.List<Cell> cellsWhereBushiSelectedCanMove)
      Displays the cells where bushi selected can move. The way to display it depend on the boolean isConsoleDisplay
      Parameters:
      cellsWhereBushiSelectedCanMove - the cells to display
      See Also:
      Cell

    • alertShingShang

      public boolean alertShingShang()
      Alerts the player that he is in Shing Shang, also ask if he wants to continue to jump or not. The way to get it depend on the boolean isConsoleDisplay
      Returns:
      the choice of the player to continue to jump or not

    • alertHasEatenBushi

      public boolean alertHasEatenBushi()
      Alerts the player that he ate an opponent's bushi, also ask if he wants to continue to play the round or not. The way to get it depend on the boolean isConsoleDisplay
      Returns:
      the choice of the player to continue to play the round or not

    • getCoordinatesOfBushiToSelect

      public int[] getCoordinatesOfBushiToSelect()
      Returns the coordinates of the bushi to select. The way to get it depend on the boolean isConsoleDisplay
      Returns:
      the coordinates of the bushi to select

    • getCoordinatesWhereToMoveBushiSelected

      public int[] getCoordinatesWhereToMoveBushiSelected()
      Returns the coordinates where to move bushi selected. The way to get it depend on the boolean isConsoleDisplay
      Returns:
      the coordinates where to move bushi selected
